meanings.sent1: I alphabetized my books on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: She alphabetized the list of names for easy reference.
meanings.sent3: The librarian alphabetized the books by color instead of by title.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were alphabetized neatly in his mind, like a well-organized library.
meanings.sent5: The teacher alphabetized the students' names to teach them about order.

meanings.definition: To put (words, names, etc.) in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent1: We alphabetized the words in the dictionary.
meanings.sent2: They alphabetized the names on the roster.
meanings.sent3: The chef alphabetized the ingredients before starting to cook.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were alphabetized in her mind, making it easy to find what she needed.
meanings.sent5: He alphabetized the files on his computer to stay organized.
